replies.author: xzy50
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 xzy50 于 2013-5-12 13:39 编辑 

建议吧更新内容补充上去
Updated May 11th to version 1.18.0.  This version supports Minecraft 1.5.2.  The naga has been updated and optimized with a new animation system.  Many other small updates round out this version, including the ability to use the ore magnets on nether ores.恩恩，大致是更新了娜迦boss动画效果
还有一些杂七杂八的更新，可对地狱矿物使用矿物磁铁了

載點已死

麻煩樓主補上3q
